properties.address: All Saints Church, Scraptoft, Leicester LE7 9SN
properties.description: A Coffee pop-in on Tuesday mornings, from 10.00am to 12.00pm. Coffee/tea, etc., biscuits, cake and even a bacon butty available. Everyone is very welcome. We also have a coffee morning most 1st Saturdays of the month at the same times.
properties.title: All Saints Church, Scraptoft

properties.description: Corby Library is a public library which is part of North Northamptonshire Council. The library is free to drop in and spend time - we have a variety of genres of books including Large Print and audiobooks, local studies and family history resources including microfiche, activities for children and families, board games and more. We are open 9-6 Mondays to Fridays and 9-5 on Saturdays. FREE hot drinks are available.
properties.title: Corby Library

properties.address: Paget St, Kibworth Beauchamp, Leicestershire LE8 0HW
properties.description: A warm, welcoming space. Hot drinks are free to all. You don't have to be a member of the library but it's free to join if you want to.
properties.title: Kibworth Community Library

properties.description: Oakham Library is a public library which is part of Rutland County Council. The library is free to drop in and spend time - we have a variety of genres of books including children's books, large print and audiobooks, free wifi and computers, board games and more.
properties.title: Oakham Library

properties.description: Uppingham Library is a public library which is part of Rutland County Council. The library is free to drop in and spend time - we have a variety of genres of books including children's books, large print and audiobooks, free wifi and computers, board games and more.
properties.title: Uppingham Library
